title: Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively share first photo (kind of) of their new baby
text:
USA TODAY

Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are giving the world its first peek (kind of) at their new baby girl.

The "Deadpool" star shared a photo of their newborn snuggled in between him and his wife Lively bundled up in the middle of the woods.

"I love B.C. I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in," Reynolds tweeted alongside the photo. "On Oct. 21, the candidate you vote for will SHAPE CLIMATE POLICY. I’m proud of the climate progress made the last 4 years."

The couple is known for not sharing many, if any, photos of their three children and this one was no exception. Their newborn's face is covered with a smiley face.

They also had not revealed the gender of their newest arrival, but the tweet referring to his "daughters" seemed to give it away that they welcomed another baby girl.

People magazine confirmed and the baby's arrival in early October. Reps for Lively did not immediately respond to USA TODAY's request for comment.

Reynolds and Lively share two other daughters together, James, 4, and Inez, 3.

The 32-year-old actress announced that she was pregnant in May when she debuted a baby bump at the premiere of her husband Ryan Reynolds' new movie, "Detective Pikachu," in New York City.

In September, Reynolds joked that his daughters' refusal to go to bed were to thank for his tired appearance. The "Detective Pikachu" actor shared a photo of himself promoting his Aviation Gin and gave a special shout out to his kids.

"Bags under my eyes by two thankless (expletive) who refused to go to bed the night before, despite the fact I read them Winnie the Pooh and nearly half of Stephen King’s The Shining," Reynolds captioned his post.

READ MORE
description: Ryan Reynolds tweeted out a photo of him, Blake Lively and what appeared to be their newborn baby in a post about climate policy.
